name: Luke Skywalker, Strong In The Force
Lore: 'Luke''s experience on Dagobah gave him great skill in using the Force. Vader had to keep his focus on Luke at all times, or face the consequences.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  While piloting Red 5 or Rogue 1 (or armed with Luke''s Lightsaber), may add one destiny to total power or attrition, and I Have You Now is canceled.  When Luke leaves table, place all your cards on him in Used Pile.  Immune to attrition < 4.',
